verses.verse: And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> unto his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H4940>them<s%>, and with all the family of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%>, I pray <S%H241>you<s%>, in the ears of all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, Whether is <S%H2896>better<s%> for <S%H1121>you<s%>, either that all the sons of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, which are sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%>, <S%H4910>reign<s%> over <S%H259>you<s%>, or that one <S%H4910>reign<s%> over <S%H2142>you<s%>? remember also that I am your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

And his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> of him in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%>: and their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>; for they <S%H559>said<s%>, He is our <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1170>Baal<s%>â€“berith, with which <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> and <S%H6348>light<s%> <S%H582>persons<s%>, which <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310>him<s%>.

And he <S%H935>went<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>, and <S%H2026>killed<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, being sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%>, upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>: nevertheless yet <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> was <S%H3498>left<s%>; for he hid <S%H2244>himself<s%>.

And all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>, by the <S%H436>plain<s%> of the <S%H5324>pillar<s%> that was in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.

And when they <S%H5046>told<s%> it to <S%H3147>Jotham<s%>, he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%>, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H7121>cried<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Listen unto <S%H1167>me<s%>, you men of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> may listen unto <S%H8085>you<s%>.

The <S%H6086>trees<s%> went <S%H1980>forth<s%> on a time to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H559>them<s%>; and they said unto the olive <S%H2132>tree<s%>, Reign you over <S%H4427>us<s%>.

But the olive <S%H2132>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2308>them<s%>, Should I leave my <S%H1880>fatness<s%>, with which by me they <S%H3513>honor<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H582>man<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5128>promoted<s%> over the <S%H6086>trees<s%>?
And the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H4427>you<s%>, and reign over us.

But the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2308>them<s%>, Should I forsake my <S%H4987>sweetness<s%>, and my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8570>fruit<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5128>promoted<s%> over the <S%H6086>trees<s%>?
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> unto the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H4427>you<s%>, and reign over us.

And the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2308>them<s%>, Should I leave my <S%H8492>wine<s%>, which <S%H8055>cheers<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H582>man<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5128>promoted<s%> over the <S%H6086>trees<s%>?
Then <S%H559>said<s%> all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> unto the <S%H329>bramble<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H4427>you<s%>, and reign over us.

And the <S%H329>bramble<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H6086>trees<s%>, If in <S%H571>truth<s%> you <S%H4886>anoint<s%> me <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H935>you<s%>, then come and put your <S%H2620>trust<s%> in my <S%H6738>shadow<s%>: and if <S%H784>not<s%>, let fire come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H329>bramble<s%>, and <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

Now <S%H6213>therefore<s%>, if you have done <S%H571>truly<s%> and <S%H8549>sincerely<s%>, in that you have made <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>, and if you have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> with <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto him according to the <S%H1576>deserving<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>;

(For my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H7993>you<s%>, and risked his <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H5048>far<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>:

And you are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and have <S%H2026>slain<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%>, upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, and have made <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, <S%H4427>king<s%> over the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, because he is your <S%H251>brother<s%>;)

If you then have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H571>truly<s%> and <S%H8549>sincerely<s%> with <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and with his <S%H1004>house<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, then <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> you in <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, and let him also rejoice in <S%H8055>you<s%>:

But if <S%H784>not<s%>, let fire come <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, and <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo<s%>; and let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo<s%>, and <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

And <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> ran <S%H1272>away<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H876>Beer<s%>, and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H6440>there<s%>, for fear of <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>.
When <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> had <S%H7786>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> between <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>; and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>:

That the <S%H2555>cruelty<s%> done to the sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> might <S%H935>come<s%>, and their <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H7760>laid<s%> upon <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> their <S%H251>brother<s%>, which <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H1167>them<s%>; and upon the men of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, which <S%H2388>aided<s%> him in the <S%H2026>killing<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

And the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and they <S%H1497>robbed<s%> all that <S%H5674>came<s%> along that <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H5046>them<s%>: and it was told <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and went <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>: and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> put their confidence in <S%H982>him<s%>.

And they went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, and <S%H1219>gathered<s%> their <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H1869>trod<s%> the <S%H6213>grapes<s%>, and made <S%H1974>merry<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>god<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, and who is <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1121>him<s%>? is not he the son of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>? and <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> his <S%H6496>officer<s%>? <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>: for why should we serve <S%H5647>him<s%>?

And would to God this <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5414>under<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>! then would I <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, <S%H7235>Increase<s%> your <S%H6635>army<s%>, and come <S%H3318>out<s%>.

And when <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%>, his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H8649>privately<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1603>Behold<s%>, Gaal the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> be <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>; <S%H6696>and<s%>, behold, they fortify the city against <S%H5892>you<s%>.
Now therefore <S%H6965>up<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, you and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is with <S%H693>you<s%>, and lie in wait in the <S%H7704>field<s%>:

And it shall <S%H1242>be<s%>, that in the morning, as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H2224>up<s%>, you shall rise <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H6584>set<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%>: <S%H5971>and<s%>, behold, when he and the people that is with him come <S%H3318>out<s%> against <S%H6213>you<s%>, then may you do to them as <S%H3027>you<s%> shall find <S%H4672>occasion<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H3915>him<s%>, by night, and they laid <S%H693>wait<s%> against <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%>.

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H3993>him<s%>, from lying in wait.

And when <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2083>Zebul<s%>, <S%H3381>Behold<s%>, there come <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>. And <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>him<s%>, You see the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> as if they were <S%H582>men<s%>.

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, See there <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> by the <S%H2872>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> along by the <S%H436>plain<s%> <S%H1870>of<s%> <S%H6049>Meonenim<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> unto <S%H645>him<s%>, Where is now your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, with which you <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5971>him<s%>? is not this the people that you have <S%H3988>despised<s%>? go <S%H3318>out<s%>, I pray <S%H4994>now<s%>, and fight with <S%H3898>them<s%>.
And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7291>chased<s%> <S%H5127>him<s%>, and he fled <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7227>him<s%>, and many were <S%H5307>overthrown<s%> and <S%H2491>wounded<s%>, even unto the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H725>Arumah<s%>: and <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, that they should not <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.
And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>; and they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H2673>divided<s%> them into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%>, and laid <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H5971>and<s%>, behold, the people were come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%>; and he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5221>them<s%>, and struck them.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, and the <S%H7218>company<s%> that was with <S%H6584>him<s%>, rushed forward, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and the <S%H8147>two<s%> other <S%H7218>companies<s%> ran <S%H6584>upon<s%> all the people that were in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, and killed <S%H5221>them<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> all that <S%H3117>day<s%>; and he <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that was in <S%H5422>it<s%>, and beat down the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H2232>sowed<s%> it with <S%H4417>salt<s%>.

And when all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H935>that<s%>, they entered into an <S%H6877>hold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H410>god<s%> <S%H1286>Berith<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, that all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> were gathered <S%H6908>together<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> gat him <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6756>Zalmon<s%>, he and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H40>him<s%>; and Abimelech <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H7134>axe<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> a <S%H7754>bough<s%> from the <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H7760>it<s%>, and laid it on his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H7200>him<s%>, What you have seen me <S%H6213>do<s%>, make <S%H4116>hurry<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> as I have <S%H3644>done<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> likewise cut <S%H3772>down<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7754>bough<s%>, and <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them to the <S%H6877>hold<s%>, and <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H6877>hold<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H582>them<s%>; so that all the men of the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H505>also<s%>, about a thousand <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>.
Then <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> to <S%H8405>Thebez<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H8405>Thebez<s%>, and took <S%H3920>it<s%>.

But there was a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4026>tower<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and there <S%H5127>fled<s%> all the <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>, and all <S%H1167>they<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> it to <S%H5927>them<s%>, and went up to the <S%H1406>top<s%> of the <S%H4026>tower<s%>.
